documentType: prison count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 7, 2019. It includes official out-count forms, inmate rosters for various assignments (e.g., attorney visits, hospital, sanitation), and count slips for different housing units. The rosters list inmate registration numbers, names, housing locations, and assignment statuses.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster for an attorney visit (ATTY assignment) on August 7, 2019, with registration number 76318-054 and housing unit 204-206LAD.

persons.name: Carrillo
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster for a sanitation (SANI) assignment on August 7, 2019, with registration number 76049-054 and housing unit B01-202L.

events.title: Daily inmate counts and assignments at MCC New York
events.description: Routine prison administrative activities including official inmate counts, out-counts, and assignment rosters (e.g., attorney visits, hospital, sanitation, work details) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York as of August 7, 2019, with registration number 76318-054.
The documents show standard prison administrative procedures (counts, rosters, out-counts) on a single day, August 7, 2019.
Epstein is specifically listed on an inmate roster for an 'ATTY' (attorney) assignment, indicating he had a scheduled legal visit that day.
Another inmate named Carrillo is listed on a sanitation (SANI) assignment roster.
The documents include multiple housing unit codes (B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, Z-B) and detailed count procedures.
